|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 2165 |nqam3 = 600 |rad3n = 450 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''802.11ac Tri-Band Quad Stream Gigabit''
<small>While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are '''BCM4366''' (''FullMAC'')</small>
This is an artificially limited [[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices|Costco]] exclusive model. <small> :In this case, the R8300 is a R8500 with acqam (1024QAM) and nqam (256QAM) :disabled on the four stream 2.4GHz 802.11n radio limiting its maximum theoretical :speed to 600Mbps instead of 1000Mbps. Also, the USB 2.0 port was removed for R8300. </small> {{FCC ST|11/21/2015|indexme.}} {{see also|Netgear R8500}}
==Product features== *Get fastest speeds available up to 5.0 Gbps *Tri-band Wi-Fi delivers more Wi-Fi to more devices *Quad Stream delivers up to four data streams per Wi-Fi band *4 active and 4 internal antennas to amplify and maximize range *6 Gigabit Ethernet ports, aggregate two for fast file transfers *Smart Connect intelligently selects Wi-Fi band for every device *MU-MIMO for simultaneous streaming of data to multiple devices *Dynamic QoS prioritizes bandwidth by application and device
==Specifications== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4 GHz (DualCore ARM Cortex A9) *Memory: 128 MB Flash (NAND) and 512 MB RAM (DDR3) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] *DualBand, acqam 5 GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4 GHz (600Mbps) *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP: Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1+LAN2) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::1680 g]]
==See also== *[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
